#include <iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int i,j,test,t,d,n;
	char a[100050];
	scanf("%d",&test);
	
	while(test--)
	{
	  
	  scanf("%s",a);
	  n = strlen(a);
	  a[n] ='T'; 
	  a[n+1] = 'D';
	  
      i =0;
      j =0;
      while(true)
      {
         while(a[i] != 'T')
           i++;
         t = i;
         i++;
         while(a[j]!='D')
         j++;
         d = j;
         j++;
         
          if((d<t) || (t<n && d == n+1) || (t == n && d<n) )
         {
            printf("NO\n");
            break;
         }
         else if(t == n && d== n+1)
         {
         printf("YES\n");
         break;
         }
      }
	
	}
	return 0;
}
